column4: Hey gang, anyone know anything about Karmic causing machines to shutdown (instant power off) randomly?
I have a GigaByte MoBo doing it, and a Toshiba laptop doing it.
ubuntu freezes on me like all the time with games and all, which i do not like, but I still have to shut down it manually... as in with my finger...
I saw a thread on the Ubuntu forums about something similar, but the last post was back in June and no resolution was listed.
